text: Monica Bachmann-Weier (born 17 April 1942) was a retired Swiss horse rider. She competed in the individual and team show jumping at the 1968 and 1972 Summer Olympics and placed fifth-seventh. Her husband Paul Weier is also an Olympic show jumper. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:Living people Category:Olympic equestrians of Switzerland Category:Equestrians at the 1968 Summer Olympics Category:Equestrians at the 1972 Summer Olympics Category:Swiss female equestrians
title: Monica Bachmann
